articles.author: Manu Aiyappa
articles.title: Karnataka set for hat-trick bumper food production
articles.description: Karnataka is all set to score a rare hat-trick in bumper foodgrain production. The state is likely to touch a record 140 lakh tonnes by May-end thanks to good rain and increased sowing. This is 25% more than the state’s average production of 115 lakh tonnes.
